nodes.text: Master Smuggler was a rank within the Black Bha'lir, earned after years of service to the society. For a multitude of reasons, the Master Smuggler had retired from active smuggling and moved onto other areas of the business such as brokering information, contract dealers, or even minor crime lords in their own right. Some Master Smugglers were known to own several starships, and a stable of Pilots to crew them. Twenty percent of Black Bha'lir members were Master Smugglers.
